Module fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp
Package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

Class StartScreenController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp.StartScreenController
public class StartScreenController extends Object
The `StartScreenController` class is the controller for the start screen of the weather application.
Since:
2023-12-06
Version:
3.0
Author:
Nguyen Quang Duc
